response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance and transform your business operations. This product, valued at $1,000,000 to you, represents an unparalleled opportunity to achieve remarkable growth and efficiency in your endeavors. Considering its immense value and the benefits it offers, I am extending to you a special offer to acquire this product at a price of $950,000.

This exceptional price not only allows you to secure this invaluable asset at a significant discount but also opens up a world of possibilities for your company's future success. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in the form of increased productivity, streamlined processes, and a competitive edge in your industry.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide detailed insights into how this product can be tailored to meet the specific needs of your business.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you on this exciting venture.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
